info.title: Dispute Evidence
info.description: Dispute evidence is submitted by the merchant to support the legitimacy of a dispute .

paths.description: Retrieves evidence associated with dispute ID.
paths.summary: Returns evidence associated with the dispute

200.description: Returns evidence associated with the dispute

Title: 151cm
Price: $10.00
Quantity: 1
Product Description: good board

x-examples.name: Retrieves dispute evidence by dispute ID

codeSamples.example_code:
test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::DisputeEvidence.find(
  session: test_session,
  dispute_id: 598735659,
)

paths.description: Updates dispute evidence associated with the dispute ID.

dispute_evidence.product_description:
Product name: Draft
Title: 151cm
Price: $10.00
Quantity: 1
Product Description: good board
dispute_evidence.refund_refusal_explanation: Product must have receipt of proof of purchase

request.body: {"dispute_evidence":{"refund_refusal_explanation":"Product must have receipt of proof of purchase"}}

x-examples.name: Update dispute evidence's refund refusal explanation

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"dispute_evidence":{"refund_refusal_explanation":"Product must have receipt of proof of purchase"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-07/shopify_payments/disputes/598735659/dispute_evidences.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

dispute_evidence = ShopifyAPI::DisputeEvidence.new(session: test_session)
dispute_evidence.dispute_id = 598735659
dispute_evidence.refund_refusal_explanation = "Product must have receipt of proof of purchase"
dispute_evidence.save!

properties.description: The ID of the dispute evidence.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The ID of the dispute that the dispute evidence belongs to.
properties.name: payments_dispute_id

properties.description: The activity logs associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: access_activity_log

properties.description: The uncategorized text for the dispute evidence.
properties.name: uncategorized_text

properties.description: The mailing address for shipping that is provided by the customer.
properties.name: shipping_address_attributes

properties.description: The cancellation policy disclosure associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: cancellation_policy_disclosure

properties.description: The cancellation rebuttal associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: cancellation_rebuttal

properties.description: The refund policy disclosure associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: refund_policy_disclosure

properties.description: The refund refusal explanation associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: refund_refusal_explanation

properties.description: The product description for this dispute evidence.
properties.name: product_description

properties.description: Whether the dispute evidence is submitted.
properties.name: submitted

properties.description: "The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when dispute evidence was created.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: "The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when dispute evidence was updated. Returns null if evidence has not yet been updated.
properties.name: updated_on

properties.description: Dispute files associated with dispute evidence.
properties.name: dispute_evidence_files

properties.description: The billing address that is provided by the customer.
properties.name: billing_address

properties.description: The fulfillments associated with the dispute evidence.
properties.name: fulfillments
